articles.author: Sports Desk
articles.title: India vs South Africa Live Score, 1st Test Day 3: Virat Kohli removed for 76, SA humiliate IND by an innings and 32 run win in Centurion - The Indian Express
articles.description: India vs South Africa 1st Test Day 3 Highlights: Barring the century from KL Rahul in the first innings and Virat Kohli's 76, the entire Indian batting lineup failed to leave a mark in a Test match that was wrapped up in less than three days time.
articles.content: India bowler Prasidh Krishna (right) reacts after his delivery against South Africa's batsman Dean Elgar, during the second day of the Test cricket match between South Africa and India, at Centurion … [+1206 chars]
